page.title: 04Clubs & Societies.
page.content: On Tuesdays I go to a club called Archery which is very exciting.You have to pay 15p to get in.We get sheets of paper saying what activities we are going to do each week.We also get a comic every month.These are some of the things we do.We go swimming at West Croft in Croydon,play games,go to the Recreation Ground,go to films and many more things.On Saturdays we go to Woldingham Field and take part in proper Archery. On Friday and Saturday nights my family and I go to the Royal British Legion in Whyteleafe. In the club there is a gambling machine and a Bar Billiards machine.There is a children's room for ages up to 12 but children over 12 go in there because of the Space Invaders game and the pool table.When I go to the club my favourite thing is the pool table.
